data.description_html:
You lend some of your ability score points to your target.
You suffer a penalty of 1d4+1 points to any single ability score of your choice, and your target gains an equal enhancement bonus to the same ability score.
(You don't get a saving throw to avoid the loss).
If you cast this spell a second time within 1 hour, you suffer 2d10 points of damage.
data.name: Nature's Balance
